TutorialÂ¶

Pynamics uses the following workflow for configuring simulations:

  1. Define a Topology object representing your desired kinematic tree.

  2. Initialize the Topology` with the desired initial configuration.

  3. Define a Sim object using your Topology, along with any desired

    BodyDynamics or JointDynamics objects for applying forces to your Topology. Run the Sim.

  4. Analyze your sim data in one of two ways:

    1. Plot data from Sim.data_history

    2. Visualize data with Visualizer.

The following pages walk through an example.

  • Define a Topology
  • Initialize a Topology
  • Define and Run a Sim
  • Analyze a Sim
